techStack.title: Built on Modern Technologies
techStack.subtitle: NatureArk is built on a reliable, open, and modern stack that ensures speed, security, and ease of expansion.

item1.title: Can NatureArk be used for free?
item1.content: Yes, the project is open source. You can run it locally or on your own server.

item2.title: Is there integration with other systems?
item2.content: Yes, you can export data and use the Supabase API.

item3.title: Is it safe to store data?
item3.content: Yes, data is stored using Supabase and access roles.

item4.title: What are the minimum technical requirements?
item4.content: For local installation, you will need Node.js and Docker. All instructions are available on GitHub.
